name: Quick Base
semantic_context: Integrate with the Quick Base RESTful API
natural_language_description: 这是 Quick Base 节点。主要用于: Integrate with the Quick Base RESTful API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: record

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table ID | 作用: The table identifier | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: True

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Specify an array of field IDs that will return data for any updates or added record. Record ID (FID 3) is always returned if any field ID is requested. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
useFieldIDs (值: None) - Whether to use Field IDs instead of Field Names in Columns

recordId.name: recordId
recordId.description: The unique identifier of the record
recordId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Record ID | 作用: The unique identifier of the record | (必填项)

fieldId.name: fieldId
fieldId.description: The unique identifier of the field
fieldId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Field ID | 作用: The unique identifier of the field | (必填项)

versionNumber.name: versionNumber
versionNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Version Number | 作用: The file attachment version number | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 作用: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

where.name: where
where.description: The filter to delete records. To delete all records specify a filter that will include all records, for example {3.GT.0} where 3 is the ID of the Record ID field.
where.natural_language_description: 参数名: Where | 作用: The filter to delete records. To delete all records specify a filter that will include all records, for example {3.GT.0} where 3 is the ID of the Record ID field. | (必填项)

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Update can use the key field on the table, or any other supported unique field
updateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Key | 作用: Update can use the key field on the table, or any other supported unique field

mergeFieldId.name: mergeFieldId
mergeFieldId.description: You're updating records in a Quick Base table with data from an external file. In order for a merge like this to work, Quick Base needs a way to match records in the source data with corresponding records in the destination table.You make this possible by choosing the field in the app table that holds unique matching values. This is called a merge field.. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
mergeFieldId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Merge Field Name or ID | 作用: You're updating records in a Quick Base table with data from an external file. In order for a merge like this to work, Quick Base needs a way to match records in the source data with corresponding records in the destination table.You make this possible by choosing the field in the app table that holds unique matching values. This is called a merge field.. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

reportId.name: reportId
reportId.description: The identifier of the report, unique to the table
reportId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Report ID | 作用: The identifier of the report, unique to the table | (必填项)
